text:
[Verse]
Lights are flashing bright
Stars are in our eyes
Music's feeling right
Underneath the skies

[Verse 2]
Feet are on the ground
Heartbeats matching sound
Friends are all around
Laughter's all we found

[Chorus]
Dancing through the night
Shining in the light
We'll keep holding tight
Till the morning bright

[Verse 3]
Moves are getting wild
Everyone's a child
Dreams are running free
This is where we’ll be

[Bridge]
Echoes in the air
Without a single care
Lost in moments rare
Twisting everywhere

[Chorus]
Dancing through the night
Shining in the light
We'll keep holding tight
Till the morning bright
title: Dancing Through the Night
